member.remarks:
Each order item is split into five financial buckets:
Bucket A: Vendor revenue (cost price x quantity)
Bucket B: Vendor VAT (14% of Bucket A)
Bucket C: Arooba revenue (marketplace uplift + cooperative fee)
Bucket D: Arooba VAT (14% of Bucket C)
Bucket E: Logistics/delivery fee

member.summary: Creates a new order on the marketplace.
member.remarks:
This is the most complex operation in the system. It:
Validates product availability and pricing
Runs the pricing engine to compute the 5-bucket split for each item
Groups items by pickup location to create separate shipments
Calculates delivery fees per shipment based on zone-to-zone rate cards
Creates escrow holds on vendor wallets (14-day escrow period)
Records ledger entries for all financial movements
member.param: The order details including customer, delivery address, line items, and payment method.
Cancellation token for the request.
member.returns: The identifier of the newly created order.
member.response: Validation failed (e.g., out-of-stock items, invalid address zone).
